name: Unbeetable!
description:
Unbeetable is a 1vs1 VR game! (local network) 

The competition is tough for the beet market. Your competitor says he makes better beets than you do, go and beet him! To do this, take your beetrootator and load it with beet-bullets to destroy his crops!

Made during the Global Gamejam 2023. We're a team of 3 Unity developers.
Tested with 2 Meta Quest2

--------------------------------------------------
External assets used:

  • Auto Hand
  • CurvedUI
  • Polygon packs (Prototype and ParticleFX)
  • Simple Cumulus (skybox) 
  • Music from https://pixabay.com/users/qubesounds-24397640/
